typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{7369} as string,
		SMITH as string,
		CLERK as string,
		{7902} as string,
		{6/13/1993} as string,
		{800} as string,
		{0} as string,
		{20} as string,
		{1} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourcesurragatekey
sourcesurragatekey derive(dummy = 'dummy') ~> Newcol
Newcol aggregate(groupBy(dummy),
	Maxid = Max(1)) ~> Aggregate1
